Package edu.baylor.flarn.services

Class ActivityService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.baylor.flarn.services.ActivityService
  • @Service
public class ActivityService
extends java.lang.Object
    Activity service includes the create operation for the Activity model. It act as logs for different user operations. It provides the content for user's timeline.
